def: To fix; to repair; to mend (a physical object)

def: To march; to walk in synchronized step; To perform a (military) parade
exampletrans: Jenna and John march in town.

def: Something that is black; of African descent; black-skinned
[ARCHAIC, DEROGATORY IN MODERN SENSE] A black person, a tribe with predominantly black people
exampletrans: Black people can be in Africa.
To be or not to be, that is the question.
